metadata.title: CVE-2018-6109 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: readAsText() can indefinitely read the file picked by the user, rather thanonly once at the time the file is picked in File API in Google Chrome priorto 66.0.3359.117 allowed a remote attacker to access data on the user filesystem without explicit consent via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
